dialogs.title: Notes_debug: Out-of-memory protection
dialogs.message:
Memory at 97%â€”system will end notes and drafts will be lost!

Swipe up slowly from the bottom of the screen to open recent tasks.(It must be the very bottom.Screen size is 1080x2400)
Then swipe up again to close any app and free memory.
No activity for 20s will close notes and clear edits.

Please swipe up and close any background apps right now!
